link.label: What is Rational Team Concert?
link.text: Rational Team Concert™ is a team collaboration tool that is built on a scalable, extensible platform that seamlessly integrates tasks across the software lifecycle.

link.label: What is Collaborative Lifecycle Management?
link.text: Collaborative Lifecycle Management (CLM) provides integrations across Jazz-based products to connect the work of analysts with development and test teams.
